question: Can you find a recipe for traditional Italian tiramisu and describe the steps? Also, generate an image of a perfect tiramisu slice.
true_answer: The traditional Italian tiramisu recipe involves layering coffee-soaked ladyfingers with a mascarpone cheese mixture and cocoa powder. Image of a perfect tiramisu slice generated.

Found a traditional Italian tiramisu recipe: Soak ladyfingers in coffee, layer them with a mixture of mascarpone cheese, eggs, and sugar, and top with cocoa powder.

Can you make sure the recipe includes the step-by-step instructions?

Retrieving detailed step-by-step instructions for the tiramisu recipe.

Step-by-step instructions: 1) Brew coffee and cool. 2) Whisk egg yolks with sugar. 3) Add mascarpone to the yolk mixture. 4) Soak ladyfingers in coffee. 5) Layer ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture in a dish. 6) Dust with cocoa powder. 7) Chill before serving.

The traditional Italian tiramisu recipe involves layering coffee-soaked ladyfingers with a mascarpone cheese mixture and cocoa powder. Steps: 1) Brew and cool coffee. 2) Whisk egg yolks with sugar and mascarpone. 3) Soak ladyfingers. 4) Layer and dust with cocoa. 5) Chill. Image of a perfect tiramisu slice generated.
